function.name: AllyLayerMask
function.description: Turns a layer number into a bitmask that collides with ally characters

function.name: EnemyLayerMask
function.description: Turns a layer number into a bitmask that collides with enemy characters

function.name: WeaponLayerMask
function.description: Turns a layer number into a bitmask that collides with ally weapons

function.name: CharacterLayerMask
function.description: Gets a bitmask that collides with all characters

function.name: ObstacleLayerMask
function.description: Gets a bitmask that collides with obstacles

parameter.name: start
parameter.description: The start of the ray to cast

parameter.name: end
parameter.description: The end of the ray to cast to

parameter.name: collisionLayers
parameter.description: The collision layers that block this raycast
